title: Little Lancer Camps Begin Oct. 25
text:
Little Lancer Camps Begin Oct. 25 0 comments 
The Mount Marty College men’s and women’s basketball team will host its “Little Lancers” youth basketball program, beginning on Sunday, Oct. 25. 
The Little Lancer Basketball program, sponsored by Mount Marty College, has been in existence since the college became coeducational in 1969. The men’s and women’s basketball players, under the direction of the MMC coaching staff, teach basketball skills to grade school girls and boys. 
The Little Lancer Program will consist of four Sunday afternoon instructional sessions on the fundamentals of basketball. Participants will work on individual skills of passing, ball handling, dribbling, shooting and footwork. They will also receive instruction on individual and team defensive and offensive concepts. 
The program also includes an optional half-time performance at the Lancer men’s and women’s basketball game on Wednesday, November 18. 
To register, visit www.mmclancers.com/camps . Any questions, contact MMC head men’s basketball coach Andrew Baker at Andrew.Baker@mtmc.edu or 605-668-1501.
